Body: Possible Duplicate:  Contacts with and without international extensions  Is there any way to make the caller IDs work like in older non-Android phones?For example, the following numbers are similar / the same:+541122223333+549112223333011222233331522223333In older phones, the phone detects the caller and makes a match in the agenda. Why is this not working in Android?Thanks.
Title: Caller ID doesn't match similar numbers except when there is a perfect match

history.Text: There's any way to make the caller ID work like in older non Android phones?For example, the following numbers are the same+541122223333+5491122223333011222233331522223333In older phones the phone detect the caller and make a match in the agenda, Why in Android this is not working?Thanks.
Caller ID don't identify the numbers except when is a perfect match (Gingerbread)

Is there any way to make the caller IDs work like in older non-Android phones?For example, the following numbers are similar / the same:    +541122223333    +549112223333    01122223333    1522223333In older phones, the phone detects the caller and makes a match in the agenda. Why is this not working in Android?Thanks.
Caller ID doesn't match similar numbers except when there is a perfect match
